column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Ate at Bavette's Tonight for my boyfriends birthday and it was amazing! I had to make reservations 3 months in advance but it was well worth the wait. To start we had avocado stuffed crab
column2: for main dishes we had salmon and chicago cut steak
column3: and for dessert we had the best chocolate cream pie that I've ever had. OMG. So good. The only complaint I have is that it was freezing in the restaurant and the music was too loud.
